meanings.definition: In the direction of the head
meanings.sent1: She looked headward to see the beautiful sunset.
meanings.sent2: The river flowed headward, carrying debris with it.
meanings.sent3: The cat stretched headward, trying to reach its favorite toy.
meanings.sent4: The students' attention moved headward as the teacher began the lesson.
meanings.sent5: The hiker gazed headward, admiring the towering mountains ahead.

meanings.sent3: The headward march of the ants towards the picnic basket was relentless.
